  • Method Details

    • checkConstraints

      public boolean checkConstraints(Trader trader, Asset wantedAsset, HashMap<String,Asset> availableAssets)
      Before every transaction we nned to check if trader is a human Investor and if we have Unit that he wants
      Parameters:
      trader - trader trying to perform transaction
      wantedAsset - unit they want
      Returns:
      boolean decision whether to allow trader for transaction

    • buyOperation

      public void buyOperation(Dealer dealer, Trader trader, Asset wantedAsset, float amount, World world)
      Fund unit is more restricted than Market. We can buy only if we have needed currency and needed amount. Probably I could use strategy design pattern here
      Specified by:
      buyOperation in interface TransactionSystem
      Parameters:
      trader - trader wanted to trade here
      wantedUnit - wanted unit
      amount - how many units they want
